section.p: You want to be sure that if you deploy HPE Helion OpenStack® on your hardware of choice, it will run and be fully supported by the vendor and HPE. The HPE Helion Ready certification process ensures that this is the case.

HPE Helion OpenStack appeals to enterprises and service providers looking to obtain real value from hybrid IT. The HPE Helion Ready program gives you the opportunity to certify once, and then sell your hardware to a broad customer base across all cloud deployment models, including public, private, and managed.
Interested in becoming a Helion Ready Partner? Please visit the HPE Helion Ready Program site.
Below you will find the current list of tested hardware and software qualified to work with HPE Helion OpenStack:

row.entry: Cisco UCS B460 M4 Blade Server
